song_name: I Want You to Want Me in Minor Key
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, I Want You to Want Me in Minor Key is more basic than the typical song, having below average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: I Want You to Want Me in Minor Key has sections analyzed in the following keys: D♭ Major,  and B♭ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
